ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Quad-band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 frequencies and GPRS/EDGE capabilities
3-inch auto-rotating touchscreen with handwriting recognition; Flash user interface; 3.2-megapixel camera/camcorder
Bluetooth stereo music; MicroSD expansion to 16 GB; digital audio/video player and FM radio; organizer and document viewer
Up to 3.5 hours of talk time, up to 350 hours (14+ days) of standby time
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint. with 3 Inch LCD display
ProductInfo.Name: LG KP500 Cookie Unlocked Phone with 3.2 MP Camera, Digital Media Player, and MicroSD Slot--International Version with No Warranty (Silver)
